0x0000/0101/0101/0011/1100
0x0000553C






Issues:
led out config wrong






Update:
BUtton Sequencee Order Maintained
Added Delay
Adjusted Delay to 100ms 
Circuit Working as Expected 
added 7 Seg in it 2,3,4,5 pins

7seg:
1-
5 4 3 2 
0 0 0 1
0x0000/0000/0000/0000/0100
0x00000004
clr
0x0000/0000/0000/0011/1011
0x0000003B

5 4 3 2
0 0 1 0
0x0000/0000/0000/0000/1000
0x00000008
clr
0x0000/0000/0000/0011/0111
0x00000037

5 4 3 2
0 0 1 1
0x0000/0000/0000/0000/1100
0x0000000C
clr
0x0000/0000/0000/0011/0011
0x00000033

5 4 3 2
0 1 0 0
0x0000/0000/0000/0001/0000
0x00000010
clr
0x0000/0000/0000/0010/1111
0x0000002F

5 4 3 2
0 1 0 1
0x0000/0000/0000/0001/0100

clr
0x0000/0000/0000/0010/1011
